name: Listverse Dark Theme
description: A dark grey theme for http://listverse.com that's more easy on the eyes.
additional_info:
This theme and others by Ninja Pants are created to assist people with poor vision and sensitive eyes when browsing online.

Donations are not at all required, but are appreciated.
<a href="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=UCMGKR46RQCM6">Click To Donate<a/>
